meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2185.

td.p: Peter Steffen, a senior from New Hampton, Iowa (subtotal of $4,600)
Paul Loeffler, a senior from Las Something, California (subtotal of $2,600)
Matt Morris, a senior from Louisville, Kentucky (subtotal of $3,600)

tr.td: THE 1980s
THE MOVIES
FRUITS & VEGETABLES
U.S.A.

RHYME TIME

(Paul: Thank you.)

executive privilege

Paul
')

Billy Budd

MattPaul
')

PaulWho is Scopes?
$5,300
PeterWho is [illegible, wrote "Scopes" on the card]
$5,899
MattWho is Scopes?
$12,201
John Scopes')
